p: According to Mgbeahuruioke et al. [ 33] the African Piper spp. EOs show great chemical diversity and presence of chemotypes. The authors cite seven chemotypes of Piper guineense form Nigeria (β-caryophyllene/germacrene D; asaricin; α-pinene/β-pinene/germacrene B; β-pinene/α-pinene/β-caryophyllene; β-pinene/α-pinene/1,8-cineole; linalool) and three chemotypes of P. guineense from Cameroon (α-pinene/β-pinene; β-caryophyllene/limonene//pinenes; β-caryophyllene) [ 33].
